public String oAuthCallback(@RequestParam
                                                                      String code,
                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                                      GeneralSecurityException
        Handle the Google response.
        Parameters:
        request - The HTTP Request
        code - The (encoded) code use by Google (token, expirationDate,...)
        session - the HTTP Session
        Returns:
        the view to display
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - When Google account could not be connected to DaP.
        GeneralSecurityException - A google probleme
